title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: While pasta cooks, render guanciale until crispy.
Whisk eggs with cheese and pepper.
Toss cooked pasta with guanciale, egg mixture, and more pepper.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Sushi
summary: A Japanese dish made with vinegared rice and various ingredients, such as seafood, vegetables, and seaweed.

title: Tacos al Pastor
summary: Marinated pork cooked on a vertical spit, served in tortillas with various toppings.
